text: Ndithudi onse amene amalumbira kuti ali pambuyo pako, iwo amalumbira kuti ali pambuyo pa Mulungu. Ndipo dzanja la Mulungu ndi loposa manja awo. Ndipo aliyense amene aphwanya lonjezo lake, Iye akungodzipondereza yekha ndipo aliyense amene akwaniritsa lonjezo limene adachita ndi Mulungu, Iye adzamulipira iye mphotho yopambana
